channel.title: API Reference on API Mocking and Testing | Microcks.io
channel.description: Recent content in API Reference on API Mocking and Testing | Microcks.io

item.title: Microcks' OpenAPI
item.description: As a tool focused on APIs, Microcks also offers its own API that allows you to query its datastore and control the import jobs and configuration objects. You may use this API from your automation tool to dynamically launch new tests, register new mocks or globally control your Microcks server configuration.

item.title: Microcks' AsyncAPI
item.description: As a tool focused on APIs and Events, Microcks also offers its own Events API that allows you subscribe to events produced by Microcks. Depending on your deployment topology, those events can be consumed directly via WebSockets or via a Kafka topic named microcks-services-updates.
